physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the Lahore Museum. The building in the center of the photograph is a long
 roofed building with a tall raised flag in the middle. The building has two short towers on either side. The front face of the building features a row of pointed roofs along the parapet
 with circular windows.The building is fenced at the front. In front of it is a barren plot of land. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Lahore Museum
metadata.materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Lahore Museum. The building in the center of the photograph is a long, roofed building with a tall raised flag in the middle. The building has two short towers on either side. The front face of the building features a row of pointed roofs along the parapet, with circular windows.The building is fenced at the front. In front of it is a barren plot of land. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Lahore (Pakistan) Lahore Museum (Pakistan)
